description: Industrial Engineer from Peachtree City, GA.  Play Lacrosse for Tech and love all Tech related sports.  Love Atlanta and everything it has to offer.
aspects: My favorite part about Lambda Chi is not only the awesome friendships I have developed, but the networking, and academic help that has come along with being surrounded by 100+ other Tech students willing to help at any time.
involve: Assistant at Drew Eckl and Farnham Law Firm
quotes: "Why fit in when you were born to stand out." - Dr. Seuss
name: Grant Herman
